FuncDef: The reset dynamic flow command clears all dynamic flows or a specified one.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a flow ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 18446744073709551615.

Clears dynamic flows from an iFIT instance.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To clear all dynamic flows or a specified one, run the reset dynamic flow command.
